subject: Re: Don't Sweat It website for mobile devices
preview: Hi Shelly, We have checked the website on mobile devices however we didn't encounter any issues. It seems that this might be a caching issue. Could you please try to clear your browser's cache? If no

full_threads.body:
Hi Shelly, 

We have checked the website on mobile devices however we didn't encounter any issues. It seems that this might be a caching issue. Could you please try to clear your browser's cache? If not, use an Incognito or Private browser to confirm. 

Here's what we see on our end:


Let me know how it goes.

Hi @ricaV2 me and glen check on the mobile version of the landing page, the video has a thumbnail and looks good on our end. Can you double check too on your mobile ? thanks

Screenshot

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris,

Yes all of those changes have worked thanks so much.

The only thing now is the video on the mobile version of the landing page doesn't have a thumbnail like it does on the main website. Can you please add that in?

Thanks so much.

Shelly x

Shelly Horton
Co-Founder,
Don't Sweat It -
Menopause in the Workplace

Mobile: +61 404868463
Email: shelly@dontsweatit.com.au

http://dontsweatit.com.au/

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Shelly, 

This a quick update to confirm that we have adjusted the mobile view as follows:
1. Clicking account reveals the sub-menu
2. Clicking services reveals the sub-menu
3. Adjusted the home page to correctly display the video embed

Please check it out and let us know if you need anything else.
Logged 15mins to harvest

Hi @chris done on the following updates

✅ 1. Home page - video thumbnail displaying incorrectly (is cut off)
✅ 2. Mobile menu - when clicking on services > open the dropdown
✅ 3. Mobile menu - when clicking on account > open the dropdown

@ricaV2 Time: +15mins

@jaime can I please have your assistance with a few elements on don't sweat it - mobile view?

I just went through mobile pages and found the following:

1. Home page - video thumbnail displaying incorrectly (is cut off) 
2. Mobile menu - when clicking on services > open the dropdown
3. Mobile menu - when clicking on account > open the dropdown 

For the last 2 elements, this function is already there but only works when clicking on the chevron/arrow.

Hi Shelly, 

Perfect, speak then!

I have a Zoom from 2-230 Queensland time.

So I could do 230-3pm your time if that makes sense.

Shelly x

Shelly Horton
Co-Founder,
Don't Sweat It -
Menopause in the Workplace

Mobile: +61 404868463
Email: shelly@dontsweatit.com.au

http://dontsweatit.com.au/

Hi Shelly, 

Got it. Let's jump on a phone call and go through this to ensure all points are covered. Are you free between 2.30 pm - 3.30 pm?

Hi Chris,

I feel we might be doubling up on the work you do and the support team does here. We made the changes together so I don’t understand why services are not showing in the mobile version.

Please implement the approved changes made in this email train. I’m hoping the updates made by your team would be mobile friendly. Why would they only be for computers?

>>>>> Hi Alicia,
>>>>>
>>>>> Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review.
>>>>>
>>>>> Here are the links:
>>>>> https://dontsweatit.com.au/webinars-and-workshops/
>>>>> https://dontsweatit.com.au/menopause-workplace-policy
>>>>> https://dontsweatit.com.au/menopause-executive-health-checks
>>>>> https://dontsweatit.com.au/retreats/
>>>>>
>>>>> Please let us know if you would like any further changes.
>>>>>



I will then check if there is anything else needed for mobile friendly adaptation.

If there is I will get a quote from you on how long it will take.

Thanks

Shelly


Shelly Horton
Co-Founder,
Don’t Sweat It -
Menopause in the Workplace


Mobile: +61 404868463
Email: shelly@dontsweatit.com.au


http://dontsweatit.com.au/


￼

Hi Shelly, 

Great catch, I have corrected this and checked on several machines (desktop and mobile). 

In regards to mobile-friendliness, of course. I recall our conversation about keeping you updated regarding available monthly support. As of right now the December allowance of 2 hours has been used. There was additional support of 2 hours used (a total of 4 hours for the month of December).

With the above in mind, can you please let me know if you'd like us to work on the mobile views this month? Additional support is billed at $99/hour.
@chris They have a total of 4.51H dev time recorded in Harvest. They already exceed their dev time with their plan which is 2hrs.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi All,

Just bringing this to the top of you inbox to approve and implement.

Also I'm not sure how but the spelling correction of
guidnace to guidance that Chris and I did on the Zoom has converted back.

It's on the Executive Menopause Health checks page.

Please let me know when this is done.

Thank you.

Shelly

This is approved. Please update ASAP.

And please ensure the entire website is mobile friendly.

At the moment we have broken links and videos being cropped awkwardly.

Thank you.

Shelly x

Looks fine. Thanks Rica. Please let me know when these changes go live.
